title: Looking for players for Platinum/Gold Ranked 5's team
body:
Hi guys Currently looking to start up a ranked team with the aim of reaching gold by seasons end minimum(Hopefully!) 
I myself main jungle tanks/lategame scalers with a focus on vision and map control, as well as support with an aggressive style focusing on early game roams mid/ botside enemy jg.
I have a buddy who is a ADC main and will be on the team. both of our op.gg's linked below.
If you are interested please post your op.gg and a small description of yourself/Rank/Playstyle and what position you would like to play.
i will be checking back on this post in a few days, cheers{{champion:412}} 

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=zaconator
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=OG%20Carry

replies.body: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Flays     / main sup/jg/mid pretty good comunicator, usually play pretty aggressive sup and jgler
add me on skype, chenerzonerz, i can play every role :) mainly jungle i can 1v5 if you need

Hey I'm Tirolei, wouldn't mind getting into some ranked 5's, looking for a fun group who aren't too intense, but also enjoy a bit of competition, currently gold 5, I main mid but am also okay (at a stretch) in adc, playstyle is usually pretty teamfight oriented, used to main annie, now floating around between annie/orianna/syndra with varying results.
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Tirolei

Hey man, will be keen :) I don't have many irl friends playing the game (im old lol, currently doing my PhD) so ranked 5's would be nice. I play any role, in order from strongest to weakest: Top>Mid>Support>Jungle>ADC. I really enjoy playing tanks in the top lane, Sion is by far my favorite but I have a decent toplane champion pool. 

I'm currently Plat 4, peaked at Plat 1 (20 points i think) this season:

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Krauser%20San

helloo. IGN: Sweddie
i am sweddie. i would like to play in a ranked 5's team because i like really good team comps. In solo, you dont get that alot. Currently gold 2. My playstyle is get more ahead, when your ahead and play it safe when your behind and wait for their mistake.  i like mid but i dont really mind where i go, i just play the champions that im comfortable with.  rankk teammyyy.

I'm only silver 3, but i would be keen to play some ranked 5's 
IGN: Tealey
